title: На ножах. Отели
overview: We raise the level of service throughout the country!Russian restaurants have long been in the hands of Patient Master Constantine Ivlev. Now it is the turn of the hotel business to raise the level of service and hospitality.Famous hotelier Dmitry Makarov will come to the aid of the most desperate hoteliers, he will put in order the terrible hotels, out-of-date hostels and disgusting hostels. He knows everything about the service sector, has a unique sense of style and possesses tools for effective management. He personally will study all the shortcomings of the hotel and breathe life into her neglected room fund. It will give the institution a chance to become competitive in a tough fight with other businesses of the hotel business.Leader of the project "At the knives. Hotels »- a real perfectionist. In work, he does not lose sight of the slightest detail - from napkins in the restaurant to paintings in the rooms. He does not tolerate compromises, if they relate to the quality of service and will not allow staff to work, after the sleeves.But the famous hotelier is not going to do all the work for negligent owners. Those who decided to perfect their service, have to prove that it is their hotel worthy of a second chance."At the knives. Hotels »change the face of Russian hospitality and help hoteliers create a successful business.
